search_general_talk_01/4401_1031_0200_10:
They’re so shiny, and
they’re only found here...
search_general_talk_01/4401_1031_0300_10:
I’d look so great
wearing one...
search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0100_10:
Hmm... I wonder how I can get my hands
on a sync stone...
search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0200_10:
They’re so shiny and pretty...
It’d be so cute if I could make one
into a hair clip!
search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0300_10:
I heard they can only be found at a special
spot in the ocean around Pasio!
search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0100_10:
It’s important for sync pairs to have strong bonds
so that we can use sync moves! So we need
sync strength! And a sync stone, of course!
search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0200_10:
Wait...is that right? I said the word “sync” so
many times that I’m not sure anymore...
search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0300_10:
A-anyway, you have to use lots of regular moves
before you can use your sync move, OK?!
At least...that’s what I heard!
search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0100_10:
I see, I see... So you two have been building up
your trust in one another for decades now?
How wonderful!
search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0200_10:
Yep, this one and I’ve been rollin’ together all
our lives!
search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0300_10: Wonderful! You could almost pass for twins!
search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0400_10:
Gahahaha! People don’t say we look alike
fer nuthin’!
search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0100_10:
Therefore, we can conclude that communication
is crucial in team battles!
search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0200_10:
So...what you’re saying is the team members
all have to be on the same page, correct?
search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0300_10:
Well, practice makes perfect...
Hey, look! Some Trainers!
Let’s battle—my team against yours!
search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0400_10:
Hold on—I’m not ready!
Don’t go challenging people all on your own!
search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0500_10:
Oh shoot, right... Communication...
Sorry, we’re gonna need to take a rain check
on that battle!
search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0200_10:
Mi corazón is going doki doki because you’re so
belle, capisce? How about tú and je have a
walk conmigo?
search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0400_10: Sorry, I have no idea what you just said.
search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0500_10:
You have to use your words properly, or else
no comprendo.
search_general_talk_01/4405_0702_0100_10:
I can’t believe that tu ne comprends pas...
What is there to not understand?
search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0100_10:
I tend to babble on endlessly whenever the
subject of sync pairs comes up!
search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0200_10:
But you see, it’s my job as a researcher to
spread the information I discover!
search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0300_10:
Mm-hmm... I expect magnifico things from you.
I hope you go on to become a fantastique
sync pair! Do your best!
search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0400_10:
Oh! I can tell that little boost of encouragement
has really lifted your spirits.
search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0500_10:
If a passerby is kind enough to give you a
morale boost, it can make you feel a little
stronger for a while! Remember that!
search_general_talk_01/4501_0702_0100_10:
If a passerby is kind enough to give you a
morale boost, it can make you feel a little
stronger for a while! Remember that!
search_general_talk_01/4601_0701_0200_10:
Your Pokémon was just so lovely that I couldn’t
help but stare! Here, take this as an apology.
search_general_talk_01/4601_0702_0300_10: Oh my! It’s even more lovely up close!
search_general_talk_01/4601_0702_0400_10:
Oh, I’m in love...
Aren’t Pokémon just the best?
Let me look at your Pokémon again sometime!
search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0100_10:
Hey, it’s Professor Bellis!
What’cha doin’?
search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0300_10:
Oh...yeah! Of course! Fieldwork!
I love fieldwork, too!
search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0400_10:
Er, why don’t we have a Pokémon battle?
You know, for fieldwork?
search_general_talk_01/4701_0401_0100_10: All right! I’m goin’ all out!
search_general_talk_01/4701_0402_0100_10: Aw, that’s a shame. Maybe next time!
search_general_talk_01/4701_0102_0100_10: Remember, this is all in the name of fieldwork!
search_general_talk_01/4701_0501_0100_10: By the way, what is fieldwork?
search_general_talk_01/4701_0601_0100_10: Fieldwork is something that gets us very excited!
search_general_talk_01/4701_0601_0200_10:
Oh, I get it! It’s like a field day!
They both got the word “field” in ’em, too!
search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0100_10:
Hm? Are you lookin’ for an opponent for a
Pokémon battle?
search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0200_10:
Bingo!
Yo quiero a great Pokémon battle!
search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0300_10:
Er...yo...what?
Speak English, Doc! We ain’t scientists!
search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0400_10: Anyway, you’re lookin’ for a battle, right?
search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0401_10:
Oui oui! 
I think this will be our last battle of the day!
search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0402_10:
What do you say we win this match and end
our fieldwork with a bang!
search_general_talk_01/4702_0401_0100_10: Well then, let’s get this rollin’!
search_general_talk_01/4702_0402_0100_10:
Don’t worry. We ain’t goin’ nowhere.
We’ll be here when you’re ready.
search_general_talk_01/4702_0102_0100_10: There you are. Are you ready?
